Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.stmt

This package contains statements (e.g., assignment, assume). Constructors of the statements are usually package private, use the factory class Stmts to instantiate them.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Stmt  
    StmtVisitor<P,​R>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignStmt<DeclType extends Type>
    Assignment statement of the form VARIABLE := EXPRESSION.
    AssumeStmt
    Assume statement of the form [EXPRESSION], where EXPRESSION is a Boolean Expr.
    HavocStmt<DeclType extends Type>
    Havoc statement of the form havoc VARIABLE, which performs a non-deterministic assignment to VARIABLE.
    IfStmt  
    LoopStmt  
    NonDetStmt  
    OrtStmt  
    SequenceStmt  
    SkipStmt
    A skip statement is a placeholder that does not perform any operation.
    Stmts
    Factory class to instantiate different statements.
